倒句: (とうく) - reading Chinese in the Japanese order
倒幕: (とうばく) - overthrow of the shogunate
倒産: (とうさん) - (corporate) bankruptcy; insolvency; commercial failure; failed business
倒産企業: (とうさんきぎょう) - bankrupt company
倒産会社: (とうさんがいしゃ) - bankrupt company
倒置: (とうち) - turning upside down; placing nonessentials before essentials
倒置法: (とうちほう) - inversion of the word order in a sentence; anastrophe
倔強: (くっきょう) - robust; brawny; muscular; strong; sturdy
倖せ: (しやわせ) - happiness; good fortune; luck; blessing
倖臣: (こうしん) - favorite courtier; favourite courtier
候ふ: (そうらう) - (候ふ only)  to serve (by a superior's side); to be (auxiliary used in place of "aru" after "de" or "ni" when forming a copula)/to do (auxiliary used in place of "-masu" after a -masu stem)
候文: (そうろうぶん) - epistolary style (of Japanese literature)
候由: (そうろうよし) - I hear that ...
候補: (kouho) - candidato, concorrente, provável, escolha, opção, lista; candidatura, nomeação
候補デスクリプタ: (こうほデスクリプタ) - candidate descriptor
候補化合物: (こうほかごうぶつ) - (pharmaceutical) candidate compound
候補地: (こうほち) - proposed site; site chosen
候補者を立てる: (こうほしゃをたてる) - to put up a candidate
候補者名簿: (こうほしゃめいぼ) - list of candidates; slate; list of nominees
候鳥: (こうちょう) - bird of passage; migratory bird
倚り懸かる: (よりかかる) - to lean against; to recline on; to lean on; to rely on; to depend on
倚る: (よる) - to lean on; to rest against
倚子: (いし) - traditional square chair with armrests and a torii-shaped back (used by the emperor, etc. during ceremonies)
倜儻: (てきとう) - exceedingly wiser than the common man
借りができた: (かりができた) - I owe you; I owe you one; I owe you a favor
借りが出来た: (かりができた) - I owe you; I owe you one; I owe you a favor
借りっ放し: (かりっぱなし) - borrowing without returning
借りてきた猫: (かりてきたねこ) - being quiet and meek (in contrast to normal behaviour); being as meek as a lamb; a borrowed cat
借りる: (kariru) - pegar emprestado, ter um empréstimo; alugar, contratar
借り上げる: (かりあげる) - to hire; to lease; to requisition; to charter
借り住い: (かりずまい) - living in rented quarters
借り入れる: (かりいれる) - to borrow; to rent; to lease; to charter
借り入れ金: (かりいれきん) - loan; loan payable; debt
借り出す: (かりだす) - to borrow; to take out
借り受ける: (かりうける) - to borrow; to have a loan; to hire; to rent; to buy on credit
借り受け人: (かりうけにん) - borrower; debtor; tenant
借り字: (かりじ) - kanji used for sound equivalence
借り方: (かりかた) - debtor/debit; way of borrowing
借り貸し: (かりかし) - loan; lending and borrowing
借り越し: (かりこし) - outstanding debt; overdraft; overdraught
借り越し金: (かりこしきん) - overdraft; overdraught; outstanding debt
借り逃げ: (かりにげ) - running away from a debt
借り集める: (かりあつめる) - to borrow money; to call for loans
